verbs.description: Whoa there , [ARGM-DIS: Bret] . [V: Attacking] [ARG1: a reporter who quotes a FACT on the air about how many times Trump has lied while President makes you look weak] .

Whoa there , Bret . Attacking a reporter who quotes a FACT on the air about how many times Trump has lied while [ARG0: President] [V: makes] [ARG1: you look weak] .
